title: Miro Getting Started
content: Resources from Isaac will be hosting some live training soon. In the meantime, you are welcome to browse these resources that will get you up and running quickly! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r0vrPSZjWMQ&ab_channel=Miro Medium YouTube video playlist for getting started (10min total) - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5euISRrbC8U&list=PLmiHe0R4hbzRbpqJVs2HllnjhrTeiDVsE Long YouTube video for getting started (38min)- https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mNNPchRnDp8&ab_channel=Miro In-Miro training - https://miro.com/app/dashboard/#/lc/getting-started/ Miro Academy Miro Essentials badge (Sifi email for SSO login) - https://academy.miro.com/learn/learning-path/miro-essentials Miro Academy Getting Started with Miro course - https://academy.miro.com/learn/course/getting-started-with-miro/getting-started/what-is-miro 100 Miro Tips - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5Bv8zaZRNB4&ab_channel=FacilitatorSchool Let know if you have any access issues! Resources from Miro Getting Started with Miro Hosting your next Successful Brainstorm Agile Events in a Remote First World Miro for the Workshop Leader Hybrid Meetings in Miro Design Workflows in Miro Mapping and Diagramming in Miro From Strategy to Solutions: Collaborative Planning in Miro Effective OKR Planning Connected and Aligned: Your Hybrid Team in Miro Transforming Your Digital Classroom
